bioAsHtml: Maria is a JetBrains' veteran. Since 2006 she participated in multiple projects: IntelliJ IDEA, TeamCity, AppCode. Currently she is a Product Marketing Manager in the Upsource team. Passionate about productivity tools and knowledge sharing.

acceptedTalks.title: How to stop wasting your time and start performing useful code reviews
